    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Run the server, and try to create a serversocket with the given port.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • handleCommands

        public void handleCommands(java.lang.String command,
                  ClientHandler clienthandler)
        Handle all the incoming commands from the client.
        Parameters:
        command - the String received from the client, through the clienthandler.
        clienthandler - the clientehandler.

      • addHandler

        public void addHandler(ClientHandler clienthandler)
        Add a clienthandler to the list of threads, when a client has connected.
        Parameters:
        clienthandler - the clienthandler of the client.

      • sendBoard

        public java.lang.String sendBoard(Game game)
        Sends a String to the client, if requested, with all the positions of the board from the game, held by the server.
        Parameters:
        game - the game where the client is a part of.
        Returns:
        a String with all the positions of the board.

      • acceptRequest

        public java.lang.String acceptRequest()
        Accept a new client and sends a message that the client is yellow or red, depending on the size of the queue.
        Returns:
        returns the color of the client.

      • startGame

        public java.lang.String startGame()
        Start a game when there are 2 clients in the queue.
        Returns:
        returns a command for the client. Contains the two players in the same game, serverside.

      • moveResult

        public java.lang.String moveResult(int move,
                          ClientHandler clienthandler)
        Bij een validmove zal de server zijn versie van Game, de volgende speler de beurt geven. Deze speler zal meegestuurd worden in de string.
        Parameters:
        move - the move.
        clienthandler - the client who made the move.
        Returns:
        returns the result of the move.

      • turn

        public java.lang.String turn(ClientHandler clienthandler)
        Send to the client, whose turn it currently is.
        Parameters:
        clienthandler - the client
        Returns:
        returns the currentplayer.

      • gameIsOver

        public java.lang.String gameIsOver(ClientHandler clienthandler)
        Send a message to the client with the reason why the game is over.
        Parameters:
        clienthandler - the client
        Returns:
        returns the command to end the game at the clientside.

      • endGame

        public void endGame(int gameID)
        Send to the client, the result of the game.
        Parameters:
        gameID - the game.

      • removeClient

        public void removeClient(ClientHandler clienthandler)
        Remove a client
        Parameters:
        clienthandler - removes this clienthandler.

      • stopConnections

        public void stopConnections()
        Closes the socket of the server, not allowing new connections.

      • addRematch

        public void addRematch(ClientHandler clienthandler)
        Add a client to the map of rematches. If the arraylist of a unique gameID has reached size 2, meaning both clients want a rematch. Start a rematch.
        Parameters:
        clienthandler - the clienthandler wanting a rematch.

      • startRematch

        public void startRematch(int gameID)
        Starts a rematch when both clients of the same game wants a rematch. Send a rematchConfirm command to both clients.
        Parameters:
        gameID - the game.
